attributes.text: Is Your EPM Reporting Purpose-Built for Finance?

attributes.richTextValue:
EPM is Designed for Input and
Processing, Not Reporting


Most EPM solutions were built to capture and
aggregate data, not report on them. Built-in
reporting is often too limited and inflexible to
respond to fast-changing business needs. As a
result, finance teams don’t have quick access to the
data they need to do their jobs effectively.

Other Reporting Tools Aren’t
Purpose-Built for Finance


Turning to BI tools doesn’t help. BI tools weren’t
designed to work with multi-dimensional EPM data,
leaving you dependent on technical expertise. This
can cause bottlenecks and result in unacceptable
delays.

You’re Stuck in a Cycle of Static
Reporting


Most EPM customers resort to dumping data into
spreadsheets to satisfy their reporting needs—a
slow, error-prone process that results in non-
standardized reports. This leaves decision-makers
working with rudimentary, static data presentations
that lack context and add little value.

Transform Lackluster EPM
Reporting into Dynamic C Level
Insights

Built for Strategic Financial Reporting

CXO is a purpose-built, web based, EPM reporting solution for finance teams. With out-of-the-
box connectivity to all market leading EPM solutions, CXO enables users to deliver high quality
digital reports and dashboard and speed up reporting cycles to meet the needs of C-level
executives. It allows finance teams to tell the full story behind the numbers with built-in
commentary. CXO instantly understands financial data and hierarchies with built-in EPM Smarts
and puts Finance in control with easy report creation. This ensures organizations get up and
running fast without relying on IT, allowing the finance team to spend more time on analysis.

Generate Real Business Value with Better
EPM Reporting

Dynamic reports and dashboards, with controls optimized to display financial data, provide
instant insight into overall company performance and
help to highlight key data points and bring your financial story to life. Enable your finance team members to create and manage
reports. With highly flexible best practice reporting templates, along with a free-format
template, you can get up and running fast and easily create the dashboards you need to meet
all your reporting requirements.

Access One or More EPM Sources

Connect to one or more EPM systems for analysis of live figures. Incorporate non-EPM data
together with your financial data using the CXO Data Warehouse. Visualize and analyze
consolidated financial data straight from your EPM, with built-in EPM Smarts that understand
your financial data, including hierarchies and definitions.

Communicate the Story Behind Your
Numbers

Stimulate collaboration and engagement with commentary and live chat to capture insights
from all stakeholders to tell the story behind your numbers. Consolidate report commentaries
quickly and easily, and track them with an audit trail to support your governance and
compliance needs. Then share vivid analysis and in-depth insights securely with other users.


Learn More

Deliver Richer Reports for In-Depthbr> Analysis

Report packs include rich, dynamic dashboards that are available on both desktop and mobile
devices, and update automatically. This eliminates manual effort and enables report users to
find the information they need fast, by filtering their point of
view and drilling into lower levels of detail.

Ready to go beyond Financial Reporting?

CXO is one of insightsoftware's unified, modular applications. Select the capabilities you need across
budgeting & planning, controllership, and reporting to get more done with less risk by bringing all your
insightsoftware applications together in one place.
